metadata.title: CVE-2015-7384 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Node.js 4.0.0, 4.1.0, and 4.1.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denialof service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7384` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nodejs - 4.2.6~dfsg-1ubuntu4.1
nodejs-legacy - 4.2.6~dfsg-1ubuntu4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nodejs package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.2.6~dfsg-1ubuntu4.1').
